import React, { useContext, Component } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { Navbar, Container, Nav, Dropdown, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import service from "../../components/Login/services" import routes from "routes.js"; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import UserContext from 'context/UserContext'; function Header() { const location = useLocation(); const mobileSidebarToggle = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); document.documentElement.classList.toggle("nav-open"); var node = document.createElement("div"); node.id = "bodyClick"; node.onclick = function () { this.parentElement.removeChild(this); document.documentElement.classList.toggle("nav-open"); }; document.body.appendChild(node); }; const getBrandText = () => { for (let i = 0; i < routes.length; i++) { if (location.pathname.indexOf(routes[i].layout + routes[i].path) !== -1) { return routes[i].name; } } return "Brand"; }; const { logoutUser, refresh_token } = useContext(UserContext); const logoutAuth =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() service.logout() } return (
e.preventDefault()} className="mr-2" > {getBrandText()}
e.preventDefault()} className="m-0" > Dashboard 5 Notification e.preventDefault()} > Notification 1 e.preventDefault()} > Notification 2 e.preventDefault()} > Notification 3 e.preventDefault()} > Notification 4 e.preventDefault()} > Another notification e.preventDefault()} >  Search
e.preventDefault()} > Account Dropdown e.preventDefault()} > Action e.preventDefault()} > Another action e.preventDefault()} > Something e.preventDefault()} > Something else here
e.preventDefault()} > Separated link logoutUser()}> Log out
); } export default Header;
